pullRequest.title: GraphQL: Add Option For Separated Arguments
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added option to provide arguments using variables (i.e. not inline).
The active scan input vectors for separated arguments are working as expected.

To do:

 Add variables as a query string when specifying separated arguments via an application/graphql post request
(see https://stackoverflow.com/q/43675933).
 Add Unit Tests for the separated arguments.
 Be able to generate arguments in both ways at the same time.
 Stop the generator when the session is changed.
 Add input vectors support for inline arguments. (added in #2550).

All inputs / suggestions are appreciated :D.
Signed-off-by: ricekot ricekot@gmail.com

nodes.bodyText: We should clear the list too, to not keep references to the threads longer than needed (ideally the thread/parser would remove itself once done too).
This should be synchronised (e.g. wrap with Collections.synchronizedList), to not add while looping (which would lead to a ConcurrentModificationException).
